subject: RGB
description_text: Hi, I just got the Simsonn Pro X pedals, throttle and Brake, do I need an additional connection for the RGB to function?? What's missing for me to achieve that? Thank you. Sent from Android device

conversations.body_text: Hi Joel Bandera,  The pedals will start working as soon as they’re plugged into the power supply, with the default lighting effect set to "flowing light." You can download version 2.0.8 of the management software and follow the user manual to customize the lighting effects.
Thank you I got it ..and appreciate the prompt response.... Sent from Android device
